==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=差,荖,𢀩,𢀠,𢀞}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|來|手|ls=ic|t1=wheat|t2=hand}} – to [[hull]] [[wheat]] by rubbing grains inside hands. Original form of {{och-l|搓|to rub with hands; to scrub; to twist}}.

{{zh-l|*工}} or {{zh-l|*口}} was later added under {{lang|zh|手}} to form {{och-l|左|left}}, which is also this character's phonetic component.
